src:
Quando o relógio é original, pode bater que ele não quebra
07 Nov 2019, 20:37 by Joe



Cara, mesmo se fosse original, eu jamais bateria nele dessa forma…
As pessoas confiam demais nas coisas. E nem bonito o relógio é…
text:
When the watch is original, it may hit that it does not break
07 Nov 2019, 20:37 by Joe



Man, even if it was original, I would never hit him like this
People trust things too much. And not even beautiful the clock is…
